tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    procurement_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE procurement_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    quantity_ordered INT,
    order_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE procurement_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_management (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE procurement_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    purchase_date DATE
)
